content.rendered:
Anyone interested in joining the Ski Club can retrieve a signup packet from the house office Monday 9/8- Friday 9/12. 

WELCOME BACK TO SCHOOL!

excerpt.rendered: Anyone interested in joining the Ski Club can retrieve a signup packet from the house office Monday 9/8- Friday 9/12.  WELCOME BACK TO SCHOOL!
